hero.title: Suffered an Accident or Damage? We handle everything for your peace of mind.
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of members for less than €0.05 a day (€20/year). We work for you, to ensure you get the compensation you deserve. Get 24/7 emergency assistance and receive your digital card immediately.
hero.ctaSubtitle: Don't wait for an accident to happen. Join Asistenca and be prepared for anything.
hero.v2_title: File your claim quickly, with transparent follow-up.
hero.v2_subtitle: Start in minutes, upload evidence once, and track every next step clearly.
hero.v2_trust: Secure • Fast • Transparent • Used in pilot in KS/MK
